name: Darkness (99lab)
description:
Darkness is a horror experimental game made during the 99jam + Adol3tra. The theme of the jam was "Accessibility" and the goal was to create games that were accessible to people with disabilities. 

On Darkness, you will be walking on the dark trying to figure out how to get out of the room you are currently in. There are no graphics, no title screen, no text, nothing visual. Only sounds. 

Let us know what is your interpretation of the story that was told.
